title: A Univers font? If so, which one?
content:
I am trying to identify the font for "valuation advisors" in this logo. I believe it is a Univers font but can't find the perfect match. Thank you for helping!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804090936im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Acclaro_color_4656.jpg)
author: cobieball

comments.content:
Please ask for font IDs in the ID section.
